website_summaries.verdict: A retro-inspired, chunky sneaker with a comfortable fit and lightweight feel comes in the form of the Fila Disruptor 2 Premium. One of Fila’s popular kicks in the market, the minimal details on the upper create the perfect balance against the shoe’s bulky silhouette. It is undeniable that the Fila Disruptor 2 Premium has a huge following both from the young ones and the “young once.”
pros: The majority of purchasers decided to buy the Fila Disruptor 2 Premium because of its style
A good number of wearers find this sneaker to be insanely comfortable
Some mention that walking with this kick feels like walking on the clouds
Several users appreciate the extra boost in height with this chunky sneaker
This shoe looks great with casual outfits, according to many
Plenty of consumers love getting compliments with the Fila Disruptor 2 Premium sneaker
Many reviewers notice that this shoe looks like a Balenciaga
Numerous users with foot problems do not find any issues with this sneaker
A few agree that this shoe has good quality
This shoe is easy to clean, according to some sneakerheads
cons: According to a lot of commenters, the premium version of the Disruptor 2 feels snug, especially in the toe box area
A few notice that the laces do not help in tightening the shoe

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wasn’t expecting these trainers but was overjoyed with them,they fitted great as well
customer_reviews.author: peter schofield

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shoes
customer_reviews.text: Value for money for a genuine product. The sizing is true. They are comfortable enough, I have quite wode feet for a woman and can feel some pressure on my last metatarsals which might be a matter of them not being broken in well yet. They are really sturdy and give good grip. Stones like getting stuck in the sole which can sometimes be uncomfortable but it doesn't happen often. I love the style so it makes it up for the small issues. In the photos that have been work multiple times already. I also used wax product which caused slight yellowing.
customer_reviews.author: Driana

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I was worried the size 6 would be a little too small but they fit perfectly. Very comfortable and soft and look good. I would say they are good value.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very good. They are very comfy and look really good we being worn. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: redbristows66

customer_reviews.title: Good all round
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and good quality. I got this for my daughter who’s a narrow foot size 6 and they fit perfect. Cheaper in price as well then other places.

customer_reviews.title: Best make and trainers ever
customer_reviews.text: My best trainers I've ever brought my fave make and they fit just right arrived on time and I will be ordering again soon.

customer_reviews.title: Changing the colour.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to Dislike about them, my daughter had a white pair so I sent them back and I'll get the black pair

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Daughter when they became a trend. She loves them !! Great quality. They arrived on time and well packaged. They are still in good condition now so worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size bigger than normally
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my 10 year old daughter and normally she is a size 4.5 or 5 and I bought size 6 as Fila shoes are very small generally and they fit her perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: wear these for work where I'm either cycling or walking miles at a time and constantly on my feet, no matter the weather. keeps my feet warm and dry, the shoes themselves don't have much if any arch support but I wear orthotics anyway so with the size of the shoe being perfect there is plenty of support.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Shame they don’t do half sizes
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product but size 6 too big and size 5 too small. Retailer doesn’t stock half sizes or return within the period stated on Amazon when buying

customer_reviews.title: Favourite Trainers - Fast Delivery!
customer_reviews.text: My trainers were delivered in a couple of days and even the box didn’t have a single scratch or dent on it so the shoes were perfect when delivered!

customer_reviews.title: Great service delivered the next day !
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new trainers,perfect fit that she can put in her own insoles. Great support for her weak ankle. They arrived the next day which was fantastic !

product_meta.title: Fila Disruptor 2 Premium Womens Synthetic Material Trainers Yellow/White/Black
product_meta.description: Fila Disruptor 2 Premium Womens Trainers. Ladies 90'S Favourite Fila Disruptor Ii Premium Synthetic Upper Lace Up Trainers Featuring Unique Eyerow Detailing, Embroidered Fila Logo And An Extra Chunky Moulded Rubber Outsole.. Yellow/White/Black.
feature_bullets: Material Composition: Upper: Synthetic/Leather / Lining: No Stock Textile / Outsole: EVA/RB
